body_html: @mrry Use-case is training AI agents on OpenAI Universe. You have a stochastic agent like this one interacting with an environment external to TensorFlow, so all of the training observations go through feed_dict. (technically the bulk of data transfer is feed rather than fetch, but they have similar speed)
body_text: @mrry Use-case is training AI agents on OpenAI Universe. You have a stochastic agent like this one interacting with an environment external to TensorFlow, so all of the training observations go through feed_dict. (technically the bulk of data transfer is feed rather than fetch, but they have similar speed)
body: @mrry Use-case is training AI agents on OpenAI Universe. You have a stochastic agent like [this one](https://github.com/openai/universe-starter-agent) interacting with an environment external to TensorFlow, so all of the training observations go through `feed_dict`. (technically the bulk of data transfer is feed rather than fetch, but they have similar speed)
